parameters.name: ConditionalAccessPolicyType
parameters.description:
Type of the conditional access policy, with the following options:

arn:alibaba:idaas:authn:access:policy:system: System policy.

parameters.name: ConditionsConfig
parameters.description: Condition content configuration for the conditional access policy

parameters.name: DecisionConfig
parameters.description: Action configuration for the conditional access policy

parameters.name: DecisionType
parameters.description:
Execution type of the conditional access policy, with the following options:

enforcement: Enforce the policy.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Description of the conditional access policy

parameters.name: EvaluateAt
parameters.description:
Execution point of the conditional access policy, with the following options:

- arn:alibaba:idaas:authn:access:rule:eval_at:after_step1: Allow.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description:
Priority of the conditional access policy, lower values indicate higher priority
Minimum value: 1
Maximum value: 100
